sn35.232:4.4: The lack of close -ti makes it impossible to determine exactly where this quote ends and the next begins. BB treats the following sentences as belonging to Kotthita, but both MS and PTS punctuate as if it’s Sariputta. However, in SN 41.1 the use of vocatives in an otherwise identical passage shows that BB is correct.
sn35.232:9.1: It’s unclear to me whether this phrase is looking back to the previous case or forward to the next. It is most commonly used at the end of a section, but sometimes also at the beginning.
